    public class JSizer
extends javax.swing.JComponent

    序列化表格

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  JSizer.Components
      An Components is a customized ArrayList which contains all the components regarded
      (专用程序包) class  JSizer.Configs
      Configs is a customized arrayList

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 javax.swing.JComponent

        javax.swing.JComponent.AccessibleJComponent

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected JSizer.Components components
      The objects of size adjustment
      (专用程序包) JSizer.Configs currentConfigs
      Size of components currently
      (专用程序包) int[] difference
      Difference between current configuration and the original configuration, updated in every group resize
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.awt.event.ComponentAdapter> listener
      Components in this list will be monitered, every change in their size will cause a collective resize
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listenerIndex
      List of indexes of the monitered components, every change in their size will cause a collective resize
      (专用程序包) JSizer.Configs orgConfigs
      Standarlized structural configuration
      (专用程序包) double[] ratio
      Ratio between current configuration and the original configuration, updated in every group resize
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Default serial version ID

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JSizer(javax.swing.JComponent... ComponentList)
      Constructor: Takes in the JComponents and adds them into the resize waiting list, and initializes the stuctural configuration for all components

      • JSizer

        public JSizer(javax.swing.JComponent... ComponentList)
        Constructor:
        Takes in the JComponents and adds them into the resize waiting list,
        and initializes the stuctural configuration for all components

        参数:
        ComponentList -
        the first element of ComponentList is the scaling standard by default

        codeLibrary.JSizer.orgConfig

                    int height)

        参数:
        width - - the new width of this component in pixels
        height - - the new height of this component in pixels

      • addListener

        public void addListener(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Adds a JFrame as the size listener. Whenever its size is changed, the size is passed into the resizeAll method along with the reference of the first component in components
        参数:
        component -

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(int index)
        removes the size listener of the component locates at index
        参数:
        index -

      • changeSize

        protected void changeSize(int index)
        Takes in the component index to locate the component in components array and resize it according to the ratio
        参数:
        index - the index where the component is located in Components
        ratio - the resizing ratio between the original component size and the new component size

      • changeLocation

        protected void changeLocation(int index)
        Takes in the component index to locate the component in components array and relocate it according to the ratio
        参数:
        index - the index where the component is located in Components
        difference - the relocating difference between the original component location and the new component location

      • compare

        protected double[] compare(java.awt.Dimension size1,
                           java.awt.Dimension size2)
        returns the ratio between to components
        参数:
        size1 - the size of the first component
        size2 - the size of the second component
        返回:
        the ratio between to components
